elements.title: Software Engineer at Google YouTube
elements.text: Creating the best Analytics tools on desktop and mobile for YouTube creators.

elements.title: Software Engineer Intern at Google
elements.text: I developed the frontend of PerfKit Explorer, a @@web tool for composing queries and dashboards. The tool is now @@open @@source on GitHub and uses AngularJS, Google Charts and Closure.

elements.title: tomsdev.github.com
elements.text: @@web:Website of Thomas Laurent in HTML5/CSS3 using Punch, Handlebars, Bootstrap-Responsive and Less. Fully @@responsive, it works well on mobile, tablet and desktop.

elements.title: Brackets TypeScript CodeIntel
elements.text: Plugin for Adobe Brackets code editor. It adds TypeScript support (Auto-completion, Quick Edit and more soon). It's built using @@web technologies but runs as a @@software.

elements.title: Vocabulary
elements.text: A @@mobile @@web application to help language learners learn new words and their meanings. Built with AngularJS and jQuery mobile. Unit tested with Jasmine.

elements.title: Topological Sort
elements.text: Interesting @@web application of topological sort. Good example of using AngularJS to build the UI, the service and test all the code with Jasmine.

elements.title: Web developer at EADS Astrium
elements.text: Prototyped a @@web version of existing GIS software using AngularJS, jQuery and Dynatree. It communicated with a Unity component and worked well with 10,000 objects.

elements.title: Birthday Social Calendar
elements.text: One of the first @@software:apps in the Windows 8 store. More than 80,000 downloads. This application connects to Facebook and allows you to see upcoming birthdays of your friends and have reminders directly on Windows 8.

elements.title: Emoscale
elements.text: Won third prize of Startup Weekend Montpellier @@competition. A @@software for EEG headsets, used in neuromarketing studies. It reads and logs your mood, mind and engagement to measure the impact of video pitches and new products.

elements.title: Software developer at EADS Astrium
elements.text: Developed a timeline component with many functions for GIS @@software using WPF. It worked well with 10,000 time-tagged objects and kept synchronized with the other components.

elements.title: Azure and .Net video training courses in French
elements.text: I made a couple videos about @@web:Azure and .Net development.

elements.title: YouFood
elements.text: A @@web application for restaurants with realtime features via websockets. Clients can order a meal from their phone, waiters will see it in realtime on their tablets and cookers can take orders and mark them ready to served! Using ASP.Net MVC, Entity Framework and SignalR.

elements.title: Trainer at SUPINFO International University
elements.text: Taught approximately 500 hours of Silverlight, ASP.Net, WP7, EF, TFS and Azure to university classes.

elements.title: Intern at Exakis
elements.text: Prototyped and developed a timesheet management @@web application using ASP.Net.

elements.title: Ahead
elements.text: Won third prize in Microsoft Europe @@competition "Pitch Your App to Steve Ballmer". An awesome task and project management application for Windows @@mobile:Phone 7, @@software:PC and @@software:Mac using Silverlight. It saved data in SQL Azure cloud storage.

elements.title: Intern at KLS Logistic Systems
elements.text: Developed a pharmacy stock manager @@web application and an intranet tool for planning using Silverlight. It communicated with the company Oracle database using ADO.NET and a web service.
